channel.title: Whats ^ with the Helmet prices?
channel.description:
So i noticed all the barrows helmets are like 1Mill + And i checked the Gold robe hat (G) its 1.2m why are hats that much?
If someone knows please inlighten me

item.title: Whats ^ with the Helmet prices?
item.dc:creator: @BAsh BAsh
item.description:
@BAsh wrote:

Uriko:

whats 76king

When you kill a npc or player you don’t get what they had. You get a ‘drop’ based upon several factors. If you stand in certain spots (there is an icon) with more than (76k members / 26k free) your meter of ‘earning potential’ increases quickly. 25% = 1/2hr. People form groups. I kill you. You kill me. Then share loot. They had an update to stop that so revenge killing doesn’t work (as well). So now you need 3 people. 1 kills 2, 2 kills 3, 3 kills 1.

Anyone else care to elaborate? Have I covered everything?

Read full topic

item.title: Whats ^ with the Helmet prices?
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

whats 76king

Read full topic

item.title: Whats ^ with the Helmet prices?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Frell:

wow bgs dropped 2.6m in a day and whip dropped 300k.

Jagex tried fixing 76king. Unfortunately, they failed once again and now you need 3 people instead of 2. Since they tried fixing it, the community panic-sold everything they own, causing the price to plummet huge amounts at a time. Everything is going to crash for awhile, but then it will return back to it’s original spot in a few weeks. Once everyone figures out it isn’t ruined, they will panic-buy. The price will skyrocket again.

Also, just because an item rises doesn’t mean a merch clan is taking it up. I don’t think the whip was taken by a merching clan, it could be simply by solo merchers or even because of the update slowly rising it over time. Of course it will crash now though.

Most merch clans are a scam anyway, the ranks buying before you buy it and dumping without telling you. If you can avoid the scam, dump A LOT earlier than expected, and simply move on to a different item.

I’m keeping my SGS, I really couldn’t care about the price anyway.

Read full topic

item.title: Whats ^ with the Helmet prices?
item.dc:creator: @maminerr maminerr
item.description:
@maminerr wrote:

Davidude:

I love how when one price rises on runescape and everyone assumes it’s merch clans that are doing it.

at the moment it has nothing to do with merch clans
they contribute to the bounce back of the economy
its the 76king fix thats made everything crash
jagex announces that theyre going to fiz it and everyone craps themself
sells their items at whatever price they can get and then merch clans are like HERES A GOOD ITEM buy it out at the lower prices and wait for the economy to bounce back
people on rs need to stop being such pussies -.-

Read full topic

item.title: Whats ^ with the Helmet prices?
item.dc:creator: @maminerr maminerr
item.description:
@maminerr wrote:

to be honest pvp is the reason runescape is so inflated.
you make too much money from doing nothing.
you see people who barely have the requirements to weild a godsword with an armadyl one ;|
you can make millions a day off sitting doing nothing and getting potential and then 5 seconds killing a friend with 76k.

my guess is everything is going to crash after the new update (eliminating 76king)

Read full topic
